creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: view through the silhouette of an archway, with silhouetted heads of seated and standing figures before railing at bottom in foreground; building with orange tile roof; people on street; street lights at right; shin hanga (fūkei-ga)
marks: in left margin, in black: [ 一九八五年　ハバナの古い町 ]; on ba in bottom margin LLC, in black: [Havana in 1954];
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Havana in 1954
